      • convertMatrixToRadians

        public static double convertMatrixToRadians(double m11,
                                            double m12,
                                            double m21,
                                            double m22)
        Converts a 2x2 transformation matrix, read from the virtual world xml to radians
        Parameters:
        m11 - first element of the 2x2 transformation matrix providing the angle of rotation
        m12 - second element of the 2x2 transformation matrix providing the angle of rotation
        m21 - third element of the 2x2 transformation matrix providing the angle of rotation
        m22 - fourth element of the 2x2 transformation matrix providing the angle of rotation
        Returns:
        the rotation in radian

      • convertMatrixToRadians

        public static double convertMatrixToRadians(double[][] matrix)
        Converts a 2x2 transformation matrix, read from the virtual world xml to radians
        Parameters:
        matrix - the 2x2 transformation matrix providing the angle of rotation
        Returns:
        the rotation in radian

      • radianToDegree

        public static double radianToDegree(double rad)
        Converts radian to degree. It basically just a wrapper for Math.toDegrees()
        Parameters:
        rad - is the angle in radian
        Returns:
        the angle in degree

      • getDistanceBetweenTwoPoints

        public static double getDistanceBetweenTwoPoints(int x1,
                                                 int y1,
                                                 int x2,
                                                 int y2)
        Gets the distance between the coordinates of the two points.
        Parameters:
        x1 - the x coordinate of the first point
        y1 - the y coordinate of the first point
        x2 - the x coordinate of the second point
        y2 - the y coordinate of the second point
        Returns:
        the distance between the first and second points
